verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If I come to Jesus,
He will make me glad;
He will give me pleasure
When my heart is sad.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
If I come to Jesus,
Happy I shall be.
He is gently calling
Little ones like me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If I come to Jesus
He will hear my prayer;
He will love me dearly,
He my sins did bear.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Refrain
If I come to Jesus
He will take my hand,
He will kindly lead me
To a better land.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Refrain
There with happy children,
Robed in snowy white,
I shall see my Savior
In that world so bright.
